import React from 'react'; import data from "../data"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const dispatch = useDispatch; useEffect(() => { dispatch(detailsProduct()); return () =>{ // }; },[]) return
